title: Ratio of forces on comet orbiting the sun

content.description: The elliptical orbit of a comet is shown above. Positions 1 and 2 are, respectively, the farthest and nearest positions to the Sun, and at position 1 the distance from the comet to the Sun is 10 times that at position 2.
content.question: What is the ratio F1 âˆ• F2 of the force on the comet at position 1 to the force on the comet at position 2 ?

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
